basics.name: Clay Miller
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Building the Internetâ€“also hammocking, pulling shots of espresso, jamming to indie folk, critiquing postmodern literature and occasionally jogging. Someday I hope to speak at conferences and write web standards. I love creating with new technologies and with smart teams.

work.summary: Xamarin provides development tools to build and test native mobile apps, including Xamarin Platform, Xamarin Test Cloud, & Xamarin Insights.
highlights: Designed and constructed a conference website used daily by more than 1200 attendees.
Managed a live video feed viewed in 90 countries.
Presented sortable and filterable information for more than 225 consulting partners.
Launched a student promotion which brought in several thousand new leads.
Provided lead tracking insights to support the sales team as they exceeded all 2014 sales goals.
Assessed polyfills and frameworks to determine the future of the technology stack.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
